title: pEshAdu pEshiDum
sahitya:
pEshAdu pEshiDum pErinbam udittAlE pEshumarai viLangumE manamE


anupallavi

  AsAn amarndu kATTum acala niSTaiyil ninrE Azhnda samAdhiyilE adu nAn enat-teLindE


caraNam    vEdAnta siddhAnta nAdAnta bOdhAnta yOgAntap-poruL ellAm EkAntat-teLivonrE
mOhAntakArattil dEhAtma buddhiyil Ugham viTTalaiyAmal vEgap-pulan aDakkip-
